steps.description: Measure and add-1.5 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-3 tbsp sugar to the mixing bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking powder to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp baking soda to the bowl

errors.description: Add baking soda instead of baking powder

steps.description: Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-a pinch of salt to the mixing bowl and spill while doing it

errors.description: drop/ spill salt while trying to measure and trasfer

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Whisk to combine mixture of flour, sugar and baking powder in the bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-1/4 tsp vanilla extract to the bowl and spill while doing the procedure

errors.description: spilling vanilla extract in the process

steps.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-Measure and add 1 tsp vegetable oil to the bowl

steps.description: Measure and add-2 tbsp water to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Measure and add-2 tsp water to the bowl

steps.description: Whisk-Whisk batter until no lumps remain
steps.modified_description: Whisk-Whisk batter until with visible lumps remaining

steps.description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 60 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue
steps.modified_description: Microwave-Microwave the mug and batter on high power for 90 seconds. Check if the cake is done by inserting and toothpick into the center of the cake and then removing it. If wet batter clings to the toothpick, microwave for an additional 5 seconds. If the toothpick comes out clean, continue

errors.description: Time is set to 90 sec instead of 60 sec

steps.description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a plate
steps.modified_description: Invert-Invert the mug to release the cake onto a unclean plate

steps.description: Allow-Allow to cool until it is no longer hot to the touch
steps.modified_description: Do not Allow-Do not Allow to cool

steps.description: remove-then carefully remove the paper liner

errors.description: This step is not performed as liner was not placed in the mug

steps.description: Scoop-While the cake is cooling, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag
steps.modified_description: Scoop-While the cake is hot, prepare to pipe the frosting. Scoop 4 spoonfuls of chocolate frosting into a zip-top bag

steps.description: cut-Use scissors to cut one corner from the bag to create a small opening 1/4 inch in diameter
Squeeze-Squeeze the frosting through the opening to apply small dollops of frosting to the plate in a circle around the base of the cake

errors.description: Measure and add-Measure and add 2 tbsp flour to the mixing bowl
Place-Place the paper cupcake liner inside the mug
seal-seal zip top bag, removing as much air as possible
